com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing

Interface TracedAction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Action, Serializable

    public interface TracedAction
extends Action
    An Action which notifies a TraceEventListener of trace events correlated with a TraceMap.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      TraceMap getTraceMap()
      Get the trace map to which trace events emitted by this action refer.
